Subject: Lynxiz

From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>

ooC: I'm assuming Nightlight left already.

--- Lynxiz ---

She exits the bases, drawing in a large breath as she smells the 
fresh crisp cool mountain air. "Beast mode!" She transforms into a 
sleek brown coloured, snow bellied lynx. She sprints into the 
forest, dodging trees. She stops only to commlink Nightlight, 
"Nightlight, this is Lynxiz, I'm going for a run, I'll be back in a little 
while." She starts again, heading to the top of the mountain that 
rests on the Chivitron base.

As she reaches the top of the mountain, she looks around at the 
magnificently enormous view of unending (depends where the 
mountain that the chvitron base is located under but oh well. =P) 
white vertical spears of earth protrude from the ground. She thinks 
to herself, <<I wonder where Termitron is...>> She pulls out a pair 
of binoculars, and begins to search the Chivitron base's exterior for 
the ant bot that she hadn't seen in a while.
